name: decimetre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a unit of length equal to 0.1 of a metre: The wavelengths range from one to ten decimetres. There are 1000 cm3 in a cubic decimetre.
More examplesFewer examplesThe gastropods are generally small (1-3 cm), but sometimes reach almost a decimetre.Concentration is usually expressed as the number of moles of solute in one litre (that is, one cubic decimetre) of solution.Changing lengths from metres to decimetres, centimetres or millimetres can be done easily using the table of metric length.
